title: Dossier
description: Empty schema that all dossiers MUST reference to trigger dossier processing semantics (see https://trustoverip.github.io/kswg-dossier-specification/).

v.title: Version String
v.description: Protocol type, version, serialization type, size, and terminator.

d.title: Digest (SAID)
d.description: Self-referential fully qualified cryptographic digest (Self-Addressing Identifier).

i.title: Issuer Identifier (AID)
i.description: Autonomic Identifier whose control authority is established via KERI key state.

s.title: Schema Identifier or Embedded Schema
s.description: Either the SAID of a JSON Schema block or the schema block itself.
